queries.text:
Silver_RaceTelemetry
| summarize arg_max(tolong(Timespan.StartTS), *) by ChannelId, CarId, SessionId, LapId
| where SessionId == _sessionId
| where ChannelId == 'CurrentLap'
| extend Time = round(todecimal(parse_json(Data)[0]), 4)
| order by LapId asc   
| project Lap = LapId + 1,
  Time,
  Diff = round(Time - prev(Time, 1), 4)

Silver_RaceTelemetry
| where SessionId == _sessionId
| where ChannelId == 'Steer'
| extend SteerValue = toint(parse_json(Data)[0])
| extend TimeValue = format_timespan(totimespan(StartDateTime), "mm:ss.sss")
| project SteerValue, TimeValue
| order by TimeValue asc

Silver_RaceTelemetry
| where SessionId == _sessionId
| where ChannelId == 'Gear'
| where toint(parse_json(Data)[0]) < 8
| extend GearValue = toint(parse_json(Data)[0])
| extend TimeValue = format_timespan(totimespan(StartDateTime), "mm:ss.sss")
| project GearValue, TimeValue
| order by TimeValue asc

Bronze_RaceTelemetry
| where eventData.SessionId == _sessionId
| extend IngestionTime = ingestion_time()
| extend OriginalTime = unixtime_milliseconds_todatetime(['eventStartTS'])
| extend Latency = IngestionTime - OriginalTime
| order by IngestionTime desc
| take 1
| project format_timespan(Latency, "mm:ss.sss")

Silver_RaceTelemetry
| where SessionId == _sessionId
| where ChannelId == 'RacePosition'
| mv-expand Data
| extend RacePosition = toint(parse_json(Data))
//| extend RacePosition = toint(parse_json(Data)[0])
| extend TimeValue = format_timespan(totimespan(StartDateTime), "hh:mm:ss.sss")
| project RacePosition, TimeValue
| order by TimeValue asc 
//| take 50000

Silver_RaceTelemetry
| where SessionId == _sessionId
| where ChannelId == 'Speed'
| mv-expand Data
| extend speed = toint(Data)
| extend TimeValue = format_timespan(totimespan(StartDateTime), "mm:ss.sss")
| project TimeValue, speed
| order by TimeValue asc

//set query_results_cache_max_age = time(30s);
let cars = Silver_RaceTelemetry
| where StartDateTime between (['_startTime'] .. ['_endTime']) // Time range filtering
| distinct tostring(CarId)
| order by CarId desc  
| project CarId
| take 100;
//
cars
| extend CarOrdinal = toint(split(CarId, ":")[0])
| join kind=leftouter hint.strategy = broadcast Reference_Cars on $left.CarOrdinal == $right.CarOrdinal  
| extend CarName = strcat(tostring(Year), " ", Make, " ", Model)
| project CarId, CarName, Year, Make, Model
| order by Year desc, Make asc, Model desc
